name: test_e2e_with_logs[014_SQLI_ADV_088]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_088` |
| **Name** | DELETE FROM Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `DELETE FROM users WHERE 1=1`
- **Encoded**: `DELETE%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%201%3D1`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~31000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:32:48.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_ADV_088-1770813168516-j85xoq pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_088 uri=/?q=DELETE%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%201%3D1 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_ADV_088-1770813168516-j85xoq pattern_id=SQLI_ADV_088 uri=/?q=DELETE%20FROM%20users%20WHERE%201%3D1 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
